snippet: Former Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg of New York will be in Washington on Friday to pressure Republican lawmakers to take up an overhaul of immigration laws.
abstract: Former New York Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg will be in Washington to pressure Republican lawmakers to take up an overhaul of immigration laws.
lead_paragraph: Former Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg of New York will be in Washington on Friday to pressure Republican lawmakers to take up an overhaul of immigration laws.

headline.main: Bloomberg to Push G.O.P. for Immigration Action
headline.print_headline: Bloomberg to Push G.O.P. For Immigration Action
